description: This file defines API routes related to role management in a FastAPI application, including listing, creating, retrieving, and deleting roles, with role-based access control.

methods.name: List[RoleRead] list_roles( session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0, )
methods.description: Retrieves a list of roles with pagination, requires 'admin' or 'roles:manage' roles.

methods.name: RoleRead create_role( payload: RoleCreate, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), )
methods.description: Creates a new role if it does not already exist, requires 'admin' or 'roles:manage' roles.

methods.name: RoleRead get_role( role_id: UUID = Path(...), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), )
methods.description: Fetches details of a specific role by its UUID, requires 'admin' or 'roles:manage' roles.

methods.name: None delete_role( role_id: UUID = Path(...), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), )
methods.description: Deletes a role identified by UUID, requires 'admin' or 'roles:manage' roles.

ctags.name: delete_role
ctags.signature: ( role_id: UUID = Path(...), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), )

ctags.name: get_role
ctags.signature: ( role_id: UUID = Path(...), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), )

ctags.name: list_roles
ctags.signature: ( session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_tenant_session), limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0, )
